text: Philippe Duquesne (born 30 June 1965) is a French actor. He is best known for playing in the cult TV series Les Deschiens (1993–2002), in which he plays alongside Yolande Moreau. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role !
